item.datanessence.data_drive.text: Select the data to load onto this Data Drive
block.datanessence.fabricator.dont_know_: You don't know how to make this recipe!
block.datanessence.fabricator.not_enough: This fabricator does not have enough essence!
item.datanessence.data_tablet.pages.fabr:
For the purpose of crafting with Essence, we have designed the Fabricator device. Essence is channeled through the lensing crystal in the obsidian base, amplified by the conductive metal frame into the items being worked with. It behaves otherwise as an ordinary workbench.

The device must be activated with a particular tool for it to craft.
item.datanessence.data_tablet.pages.data:
Every researcher is given a personal Data Tablet on which the data of our discoveries, inventions, and knowledge is stored. Its contents may be added to by visiting any active research center and copying data from its Data Bank, assuming sufficient credentials.

The Data Tablet contains security mechanisms which prevent a Tablet from accepting data of a higher tier than itself, as well as requiring specific, highly-encrypted critical data and authorization from higher-ranked peers to rise in tier. This is to ensure our gathered knowledge of Essence does not fall into the wrong hands.
item.datanessence.data_tablet.pages.esse: Deposits of raw Essence Crystal form inside caves. When mined, a whole Crystal shatters into several smaller Shards, themselves useful for many, many applications.

Research was done into the origin of these deposits, and what we found was startlingly grim: creatures native to Phenua long ago were unable to handle their innate Essence, dissolving and crystallizing upon it awakening within them. It would seem most local fauna have evolved to suppress their Essence, as a result.

The simplest form of Essence generation is to apply sufficient heat to raw Essence Shards such that they melt into a gaseous form. As this gas dissipates, it leaves behind usable Essence with which to supply machinery.

The Burner device does exactly this, featuring a chamber in which to insert Shards and fuel, as well as a grate on the top that harmlessly vents the gas.

◇ Requires: Essence Shards and furnace fuel (eg. coal, charcoal, etc).
 ◇ Requires no coolant.
item.datanessence.data_tablet.pages.trav: Infusing common diorite with Essence creates rock painted in subtle blue and pink hues, with a unique property that makes it very suitable for building paths out of: whoever walks on it will find their steps much faster than usual. We found that shaping them into bricks was of aesthetic interest, and the result was the Traversite Road.
commands.datanessence.reset_learned: Reset all entries back to their original state
